snippet.title: Student Union Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Kickstarter (Fully Funded!): http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/visualnovelvillage/student-union-a-dark-drama-visual-novel

The game demo for Android, Windows, Mac, and Linux: http://visual-novel-village.itch.io/student-union

Join our discord server! http://discord.com/invite/gTMf7Gj

The demo trailer of our first Visual Novel, Student Union! Your choices guide Lane through this dark drama and dating sim. Form a student government, recruit members, and struggle to maintain them in the face of unexpected challenges and danger. 

The demo is now available also on Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/1351670/Student_Union/
~
Or download the demo on itch.io here: http://visual-novel-village.itch.io/student-union
~
Sign up for email notifications: http://eepurl.com/g5aY6j
~
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/VillageNovel
